description:
Tomoki’s on a mission to sneak into the girls’ bathing area. With Sugata’s assistance (and one of Ikaros’s cards) he devises the perfect disguise to accomplish his goal: he transforms into a cute girl!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Off We Go to My Bathhouse Paradise
いざ征かん! 我が銭湯領域[パラダイス]
